item.title: Twitter Media Downloader
item.description: Download videos, images, and GIFs from Twitter (X) with ease. Enter the tweet link, select from available options based on size and quality, and save your media directly to your device. Perfect for video, image, and GIF downloads. Related: Twitter Video Downloader, Twitter Image Downloader, Twitter GIF Downloader
item.dc:creator: Ardenov

item.title: Why Does '5' * 2 Equal 10 in JavaScript?
item.description: Why Does '5' * 2 Equal 10 in JavaScript? At first glance, it might seem a bit weird. How does multiplying a string and a number work? Shouldn’t JavaScript throw an error or something? Nope! It actually gives you `10`. Here’s why.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Why Your Website Is Not Accepted by Google AdSense?
item.description: Getting approved for Google AdSense can be puzzling, especially when you’ve put so much effort into your website. If you’ve been rejected, it’s frustrating—but it’s also an opportunity to understand what went wrong and how to fix it. Here are some common reasons why your site might not have made the cut.
item.dc:creator: Otra Suinegue

item.title: Enhancing Data Management Efficiency through Automated Big Data Processing with BigQuery and Spreadsheet Integration
item.description: Streamline data management with automated big data processing using BigQuery and spreadsheet integration. Overcome manual execution challenges, gain timely insights, and drive business growth.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: SQL 101 | Chapter 0: Summary Sheet / Cheat Sheet
item.description: This comprehensive summary sheet / cheat sheet covers from basic `SELECT` statements to advanced joins, subqueries, and query optimization.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Creating a Synchronized Scrolling Two-Column Layout
item.description: Learn how to create a synchronized scrolling two-column layout using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This tutorial will walk you through building a responsive design where the main content scrolls vertically and the adjacent images scroll horizontally in parallel.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto

item.title: Python 101 | Chapter 0: Python Summary Sheet / Python Cheat Sheet
item.description: Learn Python from scratch with Python summary sheet / Python cheat sheet. This guide covers Python from basics to web development, data manipulation, and testing, complete with practical examples for beginners to quickly become experts.
item.dc:creator: Eugenius Wahyudiarto
